attractions.name: Rocky Mountain National Park
attractions.description: One of America's most visited national parks with alpine lakes, peaks over 14,000 feet, and 350+ miles of trails.

attractions.name: Button Rock Preserve
attractions.description: Rugged wilderness preserve with trails offering stunning views of Ralph Price Reservoir and surrounding cliffs.

attractions.name: St. Vrain State Park
attractions.description: Over 600 acres with a dozen ponds for fishing, six miles of scenic trails, camping, and wildlife viewing.

attractions.name: Union Reservoir
attractions.description: Popular summer destination for windsurfing, paddleboarding, sailing, swimming, and sandy beach picnics.

attractions.name: McIntosh Lake
attractions.description: Surrounded by a 3.5-mile trail with panoramic mountain views, kayaking, paddleboarding, and fishing.

attractions.name: Golden Ponds Nature Area
attractions.description: 88-acre park with paved and unpaved trails excellent for viewing waterfowl and peaceful walks.

attractions.name: Rabbit Mountain Open Space
attractions.description: Over five miles of trails open to pedestrians, bikes, and equestrians with spectacular Front Range views.

attractions.name: Historic Downtown Longmont
attractions.description: Walkable downtown with Dickens Opera House, first JC Penney store, galleries, and public art.

attractions.name: Longmont Museum & Cultural Center
attractions.description: Vibrant hub for history, culture, and arts with 17,000+ objects and the award-winning 'Front Range Rising' exhibit.

attractions.name: Dougherty Museum
attractions.description: Collection of 40+ classic turn-of-the-century vehicles including rare Packard and Stanley models.

attractions.name: St. Vrain Greenway
attractions.description: 9-mile paved trail connecting Longmont areas, perfect for biking and walking along scenic St. Vrain Creek.

attractions.name: Dickens Farm Nature Area
attractions.description: Longmont's newest park featuring Discovery Island play area, picnic spots, and river tubing access.

attractions.name: Estes Park
attractions.description: Charming mountain gateway to Rocky Mountain National Park with shops, restaurants, and stunning scenery.

attractions.name: Boulder
attractions.description: Vibrant university city with Pearl Street Mall, Flatirons hiking, world-class dining, and cultural attractions.
